extendedInfo.description: Warning: Explicit ContentA full featured Bill Burr soundboard.Featuring some of the best uncensored sound clips from the great american comedian Bill Burr's Let it go tour.Features:* Move to SD card.* Set as ringtone or notification sound.* Save sound to a custom favorites list.* Search sound clips.Over 40+ sounds and more coming soon. Request welcome support@EpicAppTime.com.App is clean. No spyware/Ads!keywords: audio, sound, board, schwarzenegger, comedian, standup, hilarious , comedy, funny, music, Zach Galifianakis, George Carlin, step brothers, lemon, jobs, animal, charlie, napoleon, Dave Chappelle, Mitch Hedberg, Louis C.K., Richard Pryor, Jon Stewart, Sarah Silverman, Chris Rock, Nick Swardson
